title: Sousa e Silva (Antonio Augusto de)
body: He was appointed civil governor of this district by decree of April 26, 1894, and took office on May 17 of the same year. As an inspector of public works, he published the Report of the inspection of public works in the district of Funchal in the year 1891... Lisbon 1893, 41 pages. He also published another detailed report on the same subject for the year 1892.

1894: Appointment as civil governor of the district of Funchal
1891: Publication of the Report of the inspection of public works in the district of Funchal
1892: Publication of another report for the year 1892
